title: Shekhar Home
overview: Set in 1990s Lonpur, Bengal, “Shekhar Home” combines suspense & comedy as eccentric Shekhar and his new housemate Jayavrat solve a variety of cases while interacting with a vibrant cast of characters in a charming, pre-technology era.

tv.episodeOverview: Racing against time, Shekhar and Jayavrat hunt for clues across Calcutta left by the scientist Gupta, aiming to find a vial with the secret gas formula. As they near the final code, Shekhar faces M in a deadly struggle.
